transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji. Main Shadab bol rahi hu.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Main meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan, haan, aa rahi hai.
Executive: Eh, main hamara discussion hua tha na, main 1:30 baje video meet ka.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Main usme meri meeting schedule ho gayi thi is wajah se main us time connect nahi kar paya tha. Main abhi kar sakte hai isko?
Customer: Haan, haan, kar lijiye abhi kar lijiye.
Executive: Dekhiye main aapke isme ek link aaya hoga. Register mail ID pe.
Customer: Okay, main dekhti hu. Line pe rahiye.
Executive: Register mail ID batau na main aapko?
Customer: NS Trading Company 2013.
Executive: Yahi hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Main aapko pata hai kya NS Trading Company 2013 yahi hai.
Customer: Main main kuch naam Mohammad Shahab aayi hui.
Customer: Okay, ask to join kar du na?
Executive: Haan, main isko join kar lijiye aap. Main aapko apni screen share karunga.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Main usi pe baat kar lena video call pe hi.
Customer: Kar lijiye, kar lijiye.
Executive: Haan, usi pe dekhiye meri aawaz aa rahi hai waha pe?
Customer: Bolie aap kuch.
Executive: Video call pe aa rahi hai meri aawaz main?
Customer: Aa rahi hai, aa rahi hai, aa rahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai main isko. Haan isko disconnect kar dijiye.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had a meeting scheduled at 1:30 PM.

- Executive could not connect due to meeting schedule.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a link on registered email ID.

- Customer joined the meeting through the link.

- Executive will share his screen with the customer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, video call, screen sharing
